item.title: Treating Inflammation May Improve T2D and Related Conditions

item.title: Protein, Exercise Can Curb Muscle Loss Related to GLP-1 RAs
item.description: Regular exercise and sufficient protein intake can help maintain muscle and preserve long-term health in patients taking GLP-1 receptor agonists. Meds...

item.title: Can Earlier in the Day Infusions Improve SCLC Survival?
item.description: Researchers conduct a retrospective analysis of patients with SCLC who receive immunochemotherapy at different times of day. Medscape Medical News

item.title: Endocrine-Disrupting Chemicals Implicated in HS
item.description: Ultraprocessed foods and single-used plastic bottles contain chemicals that may drive inflammation in hidradenitis suppurativa. Medscape Medical News
